title: Pre-existing merge conflicts in server socket-handlers prevent build
issue: Merge conflict markers found in socket-handlers.ts (lines 641-667) and socket-handlers.test.ts (lines 438-441) preventing server build. These conflicts pre-date the TKT-007-V2-V2 documentation work and are unrelated to this ticket.
suggestion: Resolve merge conflicts by reviewing the conflicting changes and choosing the correct version, or merge/rebase from the branch that fixed these issues (appears to be fixed in TKT-104 branch based on git history).
